energy-ammo.name: Energy Clip
energy-ammo.description: Ammo used for energy weapons. One clip will fully charge a single weapon.

heavy-ammo.name: Heavy Ammo
heavy-ammo.description: Heavy bullets used mainly with large-caliber weapons.

launcher-ammo.name: Launcher Ammo
launcher-ammo.description: Anti-ARC payloads used mainly by the Hullcracker

light-ammo.name: Light Ammo
light-ammo.description: Light bullets used mainly with SMGs and light handguns. Such as Kettle, Stitcher, Burletta, Hairpin and Bobcat.

medium-ammo.name: Medium Ammo
medium-ammo.description: Medium bullets used mainly with medium-caliber weapons. Such as Rattler, Tempest, Arpeggio, Renegade and Torrente.

combat-mk-1.name: Combat Mk. 1
combat-mk-1.description: Basic combat augment. Supports stronger shields, but with limited backpack capacity and Quick Use slots.

combat-mk-2.name: Combat Mk. 2
combat-mk-2.description: A Combat augment more focused on manoeuvrability than absorbing damage.

combat-mk-3-aggressive.name: Combat Mk. 3 (Aggressive)
combat-mk-3-aggressive.description: An improved version of the Combat II augment. Supports more shield types, and comes with extra space for grenades.

combat-mk3-flanking.name: Combat Mk.3 (Flanking)
combat-mk3-flanking.description: A Combat augment more focused on maneuverability than bosorbing damage.

free-loadout-augment.name: Free Loadout Augment
free-loadout-augment.description: Basic augment for rookie Raiders, offering slightly more backpack space and carry capacity.

looting-mk-1.name: Looting Mk. 1
looting-mk-1.description: Basic looting augment. More backpack slots and weight capacity, but low defensive and tactical capability.

looting-mk-2.name: Looting Mk. 2
looting-mk-2.description: Significantly increases looting potential; adds slots for trinkets.

looting-mk-3-cautious.name: Looting MK. 3 (Cautious)
looting-mk-3-cautious.description: A looting augment that swaps some carry capacity to increase survivability.

looting-mk-3-survivor.name: Looting MK. 3 (Survivor)
looting-mk-3-survivor.description: A heavy-duty pack mule augment. Large weight capacity and large backpack space.

tactical-mk-1.name: Tactical Mk. 1
tactical-mk-1.description: Basic tactical augment. More Quick Use slots for more tactical choice, but limited survivability and slightly lower looting potential.

tactical-mk-2.name: Tactical Mk. 2
tactical-mk-2.description: Adds more backpack space and an extra utility item slot.

tactical-mk3-defensive.name: Tactical Mk.3 (Defensive)
tactical-mk3-defensive.description: A defence-focused augment for keeping shields topped up.

tactical-mk-3-healing.name: Tactical Mk. 3 (Healing)
tactical-mk-3-healing.description: A healing-focused augment which adds extra slots for healing items.

advanced-electrical-components-recipe.description: Lets you craft an Advanced Electrical Component

advanced-mechanical-components-recipe.name: Advanced Mechanical Components Blueprint
advanced-mechanical-components-recipe.description: Lets you craft an Advanced Mechanical Components

angled-grip-ii-recipe.description: Lets you craft an Angled Grip II

angled-grip-iii-recipe.name: Angled Grip III Blueprint
angled-grip-iii-recipe.description: Lets you craft an Angled Grip III

anvil-recipe.name: Anvil Blueprint

anvil-splitter-recipe.description: Lets you craft an Anvil Splitter

barricade-kit-recipe.description: Lets you craft a Barricade Kit

bettina-blueprint.description: Has slow fire rate and high damage output.

blaze-grenade-blueprint.description: Lets you craft a Blaze Grenade

combat-mk3-aggressive-blueprint.description: An improved version of the Combat II augment. Supports more shield types and comes with extra space for grenades

heavy-fuse-grenade-recipe.description: Lets you craft a Heavy Fuse Grenade

heavy-gun-parts-recipe.description: Used directly in crafting items of all tiers.

horizontal-grip-blueprint.name: Horizontal Grip Blueprint
horizontal-grip-blueprint.description: Allows you to craft the Horizontal Grip.

jolt-mine-recipe.description: Lets you craft a Jolt Mine

power-rod-recipe.description: Lets you craft a Power Rod

tacical-mk3-healing-blueprint.description: A healing-focused augment which adds extra slots for healing items.

tagging-grenade-recipe.description: Lets you craft a Tagging Grenade

tempest-i-recipe.description: Lets you craft a Tempest I

trigger-nade-recipe.description: Lets you craft a Trigger Nade

venator-recipe.name: Venator Blueprint

vertical-grip-ii-recipe.description: Lets you craft a Vertical Grip II

vertical-grip-iii-recipe.name: Vertical Grip III Blueprint
vertical-grip-iii-recipe.description: Lets you craft a Vertical Grip III

vita-shot-recipe.name: Vita Shot Blueprint
vita-shot-recipe.description: Lets you craft a Vita Shot - A medical item that restores a large amount of health.

vita-spray-recipe.name: Vita Spray Blueprint
vita-spray-recipe.description: Lets you craft a Vita Spray

vulcano-blueprint.name: Vulcano Blueprint
vulcano-blueprint.description: Allows you to craft the Vulcano.

agave-juice.name: Agave Juice
agave-juice.description: A concoction that temporarily increases stamina regeneration, at a small initial cost to health.

cans-backpack-attachment.name: Cans (Backpack Attachment)
cans-backpack-attachment.description: A set of cans that are a backpack attachment from the quest Safe Passage.

junior-outfit.name: Junior (Outfit)
junior-outfit.description: This is the Junior cosmetic outfit

gas-grenade.name: Gas Grenade
gas-grenade.description: A grenade that emites lingering toxic cloud on impact, draining the stamina of any Raiders within its area of effect.

binoculars.name: Binoculars
binoculars.description: A basic pair of binoculars with two levels of magnification.

blue-gate-cellar-key.name: Blue Gate Cellar Key
blue-gate-cellar-key.description: Unlocks certain cellar doors near the Blue Gate.

blue-gate-communication-tower-key.name: Blue Gate Communication Tower Key
blue-gate-communication-tower-key.description: Unlocks a door by the Communication Tower near the Blue Gate

blue-gate-confiscation-room-key.name: Blue Gate Confiscation Room Key
blue-gate-confiscation-room-key.description: Unlocks a door to the confiscated goods area within the Blue Gate tunnels

buried-city-jkv-employee-access-card.name: Buried City JKV Employee Access Card
buried-city-jkv-employee-access-card.description: Unlocks a door in the J Kozma Ventures company building in Buried City

buried-city-town-hall-key.name: Buried City Town Hall Key
buried-city-town-hall-key.description: Unlocks the door to the Town Hall in Buried City

dam-control-center-tower-key.name: Dam Control Center Tower Key
dam-control-center-tower-key.description: Unlocks a door in the Control Centre Tower on the top floor.

dam-staff-room-key.name: Dam Staff Room Key
dam-staff-room-key.description: Unlocks the Dam Staff Room in the Control Tower.

dam-surveillance-key.name: Dam Surveillance Key
dam-surveillance-key.description: Unlocks a door in the Water Treatment Control building in The Dam.

dam-testing-annex-key.name: Dam Testing Annex Key
dam-testing-annex-key.description: Unlocks a door in the Testing Annex on Dam Battlegrounds.

key-card.name: Key Card
key-card.description: A security key card used to access restricted areas.

patrol-car-key.name: Patrol Car Key
patrol-car-key.description: Unlocks the rear door of a patrol car.

spaceport-ground-control-key.name: Spaceport Control Tower Key
spaceport-ground-control-key.description: Unlocks a door to the Ground Control Tower in Spaceport

spaceport-outskirts-bunker-key.name: Spaceport Outskirts Bunker Key
spaceport-outskirts-bunker-key.description: A makeshift key that lets you open the Outskirts Bunker on Spaceport

spaceport-trench-tower-key.name: Spaceport Trench Tower Key
spaceport-trench-tower-key.description: Unlocks a door to the Trench Towers in Spaceport

spaceport-warehouse-key.name: Spaceport Warehouse Key
spaceport-warehouse-key.description: Unlocks a door in the Shipping Warehouse in Spaceport

advanced-electrical-components.name: Advanced Electrical Components
advanced-electrical-components.description: Used to craft utility items and shield mods. Can be recycled into crafting materials. Used to craft: Raider Hatch Key, Photoelectric Cloak

advanced-mechanical-components.name: Advanced Mechanical Components
advanced-mechanical-components.description: Mostly used to craft advanced weapons. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

antiseptic.name: Antiseptic
antiseptic.description: Used to craft medical supplies. Can be recycled into chemicals.

arc-alloy.name: ARC Alloy
arc-alloy.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities, or by recycling certain ARC parts. Used to craft components.

arc-circuitry.name: ARC Circuitry
arc-circuitry.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Used to craft components. Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

arc-motion-core.name: ARC Motion Core
arc-motion-core.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Used to craft components. Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

arc-powercell.name: ARC Powercell
arc-powercell.description: Valuable resource that drops from all ARC enemies. Used to craft: Shield Recharger

battery.name: Battery
battery.description: Used to craft medical supplies. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

canister.name: Canister
canister.description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into plastic.

chemicals.name: Chemicals
chemicals.description: Used to craft medical supplies, explosives, and utility items.

complex-gun-parts.name: Complex Gun Parts
complex-gun-parts.description: Used to craft advanced Weapons: Equalizer, Jupiter

crude-explosives.name: Crude Explosives
crude-explosives.description: Used to craft explosives. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

duct-tape-recipe.name: Duct Tape
duct-tape-recipe.description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into crafting materials

durable-cloth.name: Durable Cloth
durable-cloth.description: Used to craft medical Supplies such as Herbal Bandage and Sterilized Bandage.

electrical-components.name: Electrical Components
electrical-components.description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

exodus-modules.name: Exodus Modules
exodus-modules.description: Used to craft a wide range of items.

fabric.name: Fabric
fabric.description: Used to craft medical supplies and shields.

heavy-gun-parts.name: Heavy Gun Parts
heavy-gun-parts.description: Used directly in crafting items of all tiers.

light-gun-parts.name: Light Gun Parts
light-gun-parts.description: Assorted spare parts used for pistols and SMGs.

magnet.name: Magnet
magnet.description: Fun thing to put on a fridgerator.

mechanical-components.name: Mechanical Components
mechanical-components.description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

medium-gun-parts.name: Medium Gun Parts
medium-gun-parts.description: Assorted spare parts used for rifles.

metal-parts.name: Metal Parts
metal-parts.description: Used to craft a wide range of items.

mod-components.name: Mod Components
mod-components.description: Used to craft weapon mods. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

moss.name: Moss
moss.description: Can be used to regain a small amount of health.

oil.name: Oil
oil.description: Used to craft weapons and explosives. Can be recycled into chemicals.

plastic-parts.name: Plastic Parts
plastic-parts.description: Used to craft a wide range of items.

power-rod.name: Power Rod
power-rod.description: Used to open the Locked room near the Loading Bay. Also Used to craft shields. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

rubber-parts-recipe.name: Rubber Parts
rubber-parts-recipe.description: Used to craft a wide range of items.

sensors-recipe.name: Sensors
sensors-recipe.description: Used to craft utility items and explosives. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

shotgun-gun-parts.name: Shotgun Parts
shotgun-gun-parts.description: Specialized components from shotgun-type weapons, used in crafting.

simple-gun-parts.name: Simple Gun Parts
simple-gun-parts.description: Used to craft weapons. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

spring.name: Steel Spring
spring.description: A tightly wound coil of metal. Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

synthesized-fuel.name: Synthesized Fuel
synthesized-fuel.description: Used to craft utility items and explosives. Can be recycled into chemicals.

syringe.name: Syringe
syringe.description: A sterile syringe for medical use. Used to craft medical supplies. Can be recycled into plastic.

torch-ginger.name: Torch Ginger
torch-ginger.description: A plant used to craft medical supplies.

voltage-converter.name: Voltage Converter
voltage-converter.description: A device that adjusts electrical voltage for various crafting purposes.

wires-recipe.name: Wires
wires-recipe.description: A bundle of old wires. Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

fruit-mix.name: Fruit Mix
fruit-mix.description: A food item that moderately increases both health and stamina.

advanced-arc-powercell.name: Advanced ARC Powercell
advanced-arc-powercell.description: Very valuable resource that drops from certain ARC enemies

aviator-outfit.name: Aviator (Outfit)
aviator-outfit.description: Aviator outfit is a quest reward from Armored Transports.

bag-radio-renegade-variant.name: Bag (Radio Renegade Variant)
bag-radio-renegade-variant.description: Radio Renegade Bag Variant - Unlock by completing Power Out Quest.

banana-backpack-charm.name: Banana (Backpack Charm)
banana-backpack-charm.description: Banana backpack charm from Medical Merchandise quest.

black-eye-face-style.name: Black Eye (Face Style)
black-eye-face-style.description: Maintain at least Rookie III rank in trials until season end.

black-hiker-colour.name: Black (Hiker Colour)
black-hiker-colour.description: A new cosmetic variant will be added to your collection for the Hiker backpack

black-and-white-origin-color.name: Black & White (Origin Color)
black-and-white-origin-color.description: A new cosmetic variant will be added to your collection. Complete Off the Radar Quest.

blue-radio-renegade-color.name: Blue (Radio Renegade Color)
blue-radio-renegade-color.description: A new cosmetic variant will be added to your collection. Complete the Switching the Supply Quest.

blue-yellow-aviator-color.name: Blue Yellow (Aviator Color)
blue-yellow-aviator-color.description: A new cosmetic variant will be added to your collection.

bow-and-arrow-emote.name: Bow and Arrow (Emote)
bow-and-arrow-emote.description: Emote is rewarded for maintaining at least a Wildcard III rank in trials until the season end.

briefcase-backpack-attachment.name: Briefcase (Backpack Attachment)
briefcase-backpack-attachment.description: Maintain at least Tryhard III rank in Trials until the season end.

burgerboy-backpack-charm.name: Burgerboy (Backpack Charm)
burgerboy-backpack-charm.description: Burgerboy backpack charm from Into The Fray quest.

cheer-emote.name: Cheer (Emote)
cheer-emote.description: Cheer Emote - Quest reward from The Right Tool

crimson-racer-aviator-colour.name: Crimson Racer (Aviator Colour)
crimson-racer-aviator-colour.description: Crimson Racer (Aviator Colour) is a quest reward from Communication Hideout

esr-analyzer.name: ESR Analyzer
esr-analyzer.description: A specialized medical device for analyzing erythrocyte sedimentation rates.

fertilizer.name: Fertilizer
fertilizer.description: May be worth a few coins.

goggles-radio-renegade-variant.name: Goggles (Radio Renegade Variant)
goggles-radio-renegade-variant.description: Radio Renegade cosmetic variant - unlocked by completing A Warm Place to Rest quest.

happy-jig-emote.name: Happy Jig (Emote)
happy-jig-emote.description: Maintain at least a  Rookie II rank in trials until season end.

helmet-radio-renegade-variant.name: Helmet (Radio Renegade Variant)
helmet-radio-renegade-variant.description: Radio Renegade Helmet Variant - Unlocks by completing Flickering Threat Quest

mastery-medal-backpack-charm.name: Mastery Medal (Backpack Charm)
mastery-medal-backpack-charm.description: Maintain Wildcard I trials rank until the season end.

olives.name: Olives
olives.description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

orange-camo-origin-outfit.name: Orange Camo (Origin Outfit)
orange-camo-origin-outfit.description: Orange camo color is unlocked for completing The Trifecta quest.

patrol-outfit.name: Patrol (Outfit)
patrol-outfit.description: Rewarded for maintaining at least  a Daredevil I rank in the trials until the season ends.

radio-renegade-outfit.name: Radio Renegade (Outfit)
radio-renegade-outfit.description: Radio Renegade outfit is given to you as a reward from the quest Switching The Supply

succulent-backpack-charm.name: Succulent (Backpack Charm)
succulent-backpack-charm.description: Complete the quest The Root Of The Matter to get this charm.

anvil-splitter.name: Anvil Splitter
anvil-splitter.description: Compatible with: Anvil  - Tech mod for the Anvil that replaces its bullets with ones that split into 4 weaker projectiles.

compensator-iii.name: Compensator III
compensator-iii.description: 50% Reduced Shot Dispersion, 20% Increased Durability Burn Rate

extended-light-mag-i.name: Extended Light Mag I
extended-light-mag-i.description: Slightly extends the ammo capacity of the compatible weapons that use light ammo.

extended-light-mag-ii.name: Extended Light Mag II
extended-light-mag-ii.description: Moderately extends the ammo capacity of the compatible weapons that use light ammo.

extended-light-mag-iii.name: Extended Light Mag III
extended-light-mag-iii.description: Significantly extends the ammo capacity of the compatible weapons that use light ammo.

extended-medium-mag-i.name: Extended Medium Mag I
extended-medium-mag-i.description: Slightly extends the ammo capacity of compatible weapons that use medium ammo.

extended-medium-mag-ii.name: Extended Medium Mag II
extended-medium-mag-ii.description: Moderately extends the ammo capacity of compatible weapons that use medium ammo

extended-medium-mag-iii.name: Extended Medium Mag III
extended-medium-mag-iii.description: Moderately extends the ammo capacity of compatible weapons that use medium ammo

extended-shotgun-mag-i.name: Extended Shotgun Mag I
extended-shotgun-mag-i.description: Slightly extends the ammo capacity of compatible weapons that use shotgun ammo.

extended-shotgun-mag-ii.name: Extended Shotgun Mag II
extended-shotgun-mag-ii.description: Moderately extends the ammo capacity of compatible weapons that use shotgun ammo.

extended-shotgun-mag-iii.name: Extended Shotgun Mag III
extended-shotgun-mag-iii.description: Significantly extends the ammo capacity of compatible weapons that use shotgun ammo.

horizontal-grip.name: Horizontal Grip
horizontal-grip.description: Moderately reduces both vertical and horizontal recoil.

muzzle-brake-i.name: Muzzle Brake I
muzzle-brake-i.description: Slightly reduces both vertical recoil & horizontal recoil.

muzzle-brake-ii.name: Muzzle Brake II
muzzle-brake-ii.description: Moderately reduces both vertical recoil & horizontal recoil.

muzzle-brake-iii.name: Muzzle Brake III
muzzle-brake-iii.description: Significantly reduces both vertical recoil & horizontal recoil.

shotgun-choke-iii.name: Shotgun Choke III
shotgun-choke-iii.description: Significantly reduces base dispersion. Compatible with: II Toro, Vulcano

silencer-i.name: Silencer I
silencer-i.description: Slightly reduces the amount of noise produced when firing.

silencer-ii.name: Silencer II
silencer-ii.description: Moderately reduces the amount of noise produced when firing.  Compatible with: Rattler,  Ferro, Tempest, Arpeggio, Bettina.

silencer-iii.name: Silencer III
silencer-iii.description: Significantly reduces the amount of noise produced when firing.

stable-stock-i.name: Stable Stock I
stable-stock-i.description: Slightly improves dispersion & recoil recovery time. Compatible with: Rattler, Ferro, Arpeggio, Bettina, Kettle.

stable-stock-ii.name: Stable Stock II
stable-stock-ii.description: Moderately improves dispersion & recoil recovery time.

stable-stock-iii.name: Stable Stock III
stable-stock-iii.description: Significantly improves dispersion & recoil recovery over time.

shotgun-silencer.name: Shotgun Silencer
shotgun-silencer.description: Moderately reduces the amount of noise produced when firing.

agave.name: Agave
agave.description: A piece of an agave leaf. Can be used to regain a small amount of health.

apricot.name: Apricot
apricot.description: A sun ripe apricot. Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

assorted-seeds.name: Assorted Seeds
assorted-seeds.description: A handful of seeds. Celeste might be looking for these.

lemon.name: Lemon
lemon.description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina

mushroom.name: Mushroom
mushroom.description: Can be consumed to regain a small amount of health.

prickly-pear.name: Prickly Pear
prickly-pear.description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

resin.name: Resin
resin.description: Can be used to gradually restore a small amount of health over time.

roots.name: Roots
roots.description: May be worth a few coins.

buried-city-hospital-key.name: Buried City Hospital Key
buried-city-hospital-key.description: Opens a locked room in the North West corner of the Hospital in Buried City on the Second Floor.

buried-city-residential-master-key.name: Buried City Residential Master Key
buried-city-residential-master-key.description: Unlocks certain apartment doors in Buried City

dam-utility-key.name: Dam Utility Key
dam-utility-key.description: Location is currently unknown except that it is on Dam Battlegrounds.

spaceport-container-storage-key.name: Spaceport Container Storage Key
spaceport-container-storage-key.description: Unlocks a door in the Container Storage in Spaceport

adrenaline-shot.name: Adrenaline Shot
adrenaline-shot.description: A serum that fully restores stamina and temporarily increases stamina regeneration

bandage.name: Bandage
bandage.description: A medical item that gradually restores health over time.

barricade-kit.name: Barricade Kit
barricade-kit.description: A deployable cover that can block incoming damage until it breaks.

blaze-grenade-trap.name: Blaze Grenade Trap
blaze-grenade-trap.description: A laser trip wire that detonates a Blaze Grenade

blue-light-stick.name: Blue Light Stick
blue-light-stick.description: A throwable chemical light that illuminates the area around it.

defibrillator.name: Defibrillator
defibrillator.description: An injection that quickly revives downed raiders and restores some health.

door-blocker.name: Door Blocker
door-blocker.description: A locking mechanism that can be placed on large metal doors to limit access.

explosive-mine.name: Explosive Mine
explosive-mine.description: A proximity triggered mine that pops up and explodes, dealing damage to anything within its radius.

flame-spray.name: Flame Spray
flame-spray.description: A classic makeshift weapon, sure to leave scorch marks.

gas-grenade-trap.name: Gas Grenade Trap
gas-grenade-trap.description: A laser trip wire that detonates a Gas Grenade

green-light-stick.name: Green Light Stick
green-light-stick.description: A throwable chemical light that illuminates the area around it.

heavy-fuze-grenade.name: Heavy Fuze Grenade
heavy-fuze-grenade.description: A grenade that detonates after a delay, dealing explosive damage in its radius.

herbal-bandage.name: Herbal Bandage
herbal-bandage.description: An improvised medical item that gradually restores health over time.

jolt-mine.name: Jolt Mine
jolt-mine.description: A proximity triggered mine that pops up and stuns anything within its radius.

laser-trap-lure-recipe.name: Laser Trap: Lure
laser-trap-lure-recipe.description: A deployable laser trip wire that detonates a Lure Grenade.

laser-trap-smoke-recipe.name: Laser Trap: Smoke
laser-trap-smoke-recipe.description: Lets you craft Laser Trap: Smoke

light-impact-grenade.name: Light Impact Grenade
light-impact-grenade.description: A grenade that detonates on impact, dealing explosive damage in a small radius.

lil-smoke-grenade.name: Li'l Smoke Grenade
lil-smoke-grenade.description: A grenade that pops a thick but small smoke cloud on impact, blocking visibility from ARC and other Raiders.

lure-grenade.name: Lure Grenade
lure-grenade.description: A noisy device that sticks to surfaces, distracting nearby ARC machines and drawing their fire.

noisemaker.name: Noisemaker
noisemaker.description: A deployable proximity sensor that sounds an alarm when enemy raiders are detected.

photoelectric-cloak.name: Photoelectric Cloak
photoelectric-cloak.description: A gadget that allows the user to conceal themselves from ARC.

red-light-stick.name: Red Light Stick
red-light-stick.description: A throwable chemical light that illuminates the area around it.

remote-raider-flare.name: Remote Raider Flare
remote-raider-flare.description: A deployable device that, when manually triggered, launches a Raider Distress Flare.

shield-recharger.name: Shield Recharger
shield-recharger.description: A handheld repair kit that recharges a shield on use.

smoke-grenade.name: Smoke Grenade
smoke-grenade.description: A grenade that creates a lingering smoke cloud on impact, blocking visibility from other Raiders.

snap-blast-grenade.name: Snap Blast Grenade
snap-blast-grenade.description: A grenade that sticks to surfaces, dealing explosive damage after a short delay.

snap-hook.name: Snap Hook
snap-hook.description: A gadget that allows the user to scale structures and cover large distances.

sterilized-bandage.name: Sterilized Bandage
sterilized-bandage.description: A medical item that gradually restores a large amount health over time.

surge-shield-recharger.name: Surge Shield Recharger
surge-shield-recharger.description: A handkeld kit that recharges a shield

tagging-grenade.name: Tagging Grenade
tagging-grenade.description: A grenade that detonates after a delay, tagging Raiders and ARC enemies in an area, allowing you to briefly track their location.

trigger-nade.name: Trigger Nade
trigger-nade.description: A remote-detonated grenade that can stick to surfaces and ARC, dealing explosive damage when triggered.

vita-shot.name: Vita Shot
vita-shot.description: A medical item that restores a large amount of health.

vita-spray.name: Vita Spray
vita-spray.description: A medical item that continuously restores health during use. Can be used on yourself or your allies.

wolfpack.name: WolfPack
wolfpack.description: A grenade that scatters into multiple homing missiles, each one targeting ARC and dealing explosive damage on impact.

yellow-light-stick.name: Yellow Light Stick
yellow-light-stick.description: A throwable chemical light that illuminates the area around it.

zipline.name: Zipline
zipline.description: A deployable zipline that allows you to quickly move between two locations.

alarm-clock.name: Alarm Clock
alarm-clock.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

arc-coolant.name: ARC Coolant
arc-coolant.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Can be recycled into chemicals

turbo-pump.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

water-filter.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

water-pump.name: Water Pump
water-pump.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

refinement-1.name: Refinement 1
refinement-1.description: A refined material used in crafting.

heavy-shield.name: Heavy Shield
heavy-shield.description: A heavy shield that blocks a large portion of incoming damage, but carries a significant cost to mobility.

light-shield.name: Light Shield
light-shield.description: A lightweight shield that offers limited protection without severely impacting mobility.

medium-shield.name: Medium Shield
medium-shield.description: A standard shield that blocks a medium portion of incoming damage at a moderate cost to mobility.

blaze-grenade.name: Blaze Grenade
blaze-grenade.description: A grenade that detonates on impact, covering an area in fire that deals damage over time.

leaper-pulse-unit.name: Leaper Pulse Unit
leaper-pulse-unit.description: Can be thrown to create a violent singularity

showstopper.name: Showstopper
showstopper.description: A grenade that detonates after a delay, stunning enemies within its radius.

shrapnel-grenade.name: Shrapnel Grenade
shrapnel-grenade.description: A makeshift fuze grenade that bursts into razor-sharp fragments upon detonation.

air-freshener.name: Air Freshener
air-freshener.description: May be worth a few coins.

bloated-tuna-can.name: Bloated Tuna Can
bloated-tuna-can.description: A can of tuna, suspiciously bloated.

breathtaking-snow-globe.name: Breathtaking Snow Globe
breathtaking-snow-globe.description: The envy of every Speranzan. Proof that this world was once thriving and magical.

cat-bed.name: Cat Bed
cat-bed.description: At least a tiny bit more comfortable than your face.

coffee-pot.name: Coffee Pot
coffee-pot.description: The power to face a new day, one drip at a time.

dart-board.name: Dart Board
dart-board.description: Some Raiders use it to practice dexterity. Others just like throwing things at other things.

faded-photograph.name: Faded Photograph
faded-photograph.description: A snapshot of the world before, faded by sunlight and time.

film-reel.name: Film Reel
film-reel.description: May be worth a few coins.

fine-wristwatch.name: Fine Wristwatch
fine-wristwatch.description: Perfect for telling the time, and showcasing that you're an exceedingly dignified person.

lances-mixtape-5th-edition.name: Lance's Mixtape (5th Edition)
lances-mixtape-5th-edition.description: Lance has personally planted a number of these around the Rust Belt, for some reason.

lidar-scanner.name: Lidar Scanner
lidar-scanner.description: A laser-based scanner used to detect the subtlest changer to the Earth's surface.

light-bulb.name: Light Bulb
light-bulb.description: Without light, life underground would be impossible.

music-album.name: Music Album
music-album.description: Perfect for relaxing nights at home, casual get-togethers, and private air and guitar concerts.

painted-box.name: Painted Box
painted-box.description: May be worth a few coins.

playing-cards.name: Playing Cards
playing-cards.description: Speranzans love to see who can build the tallest tower - before the tremors knock them down.

poster-natural-wonder.name: Poster of Natural Wonder
poster-natural-wonder.description: If you stand close and squint your eyes, it's like the world never came crumbling down.

recorder.name: Recorder
recorder.description: A playable recorder used to attract ARC's attention and impress other Raiders.

red-coral-jewelry.name: Red Coral Jewelry
red-coral-jewelry.description: Valued for its fine craftmanship, and effortless ability to make your eyes pop.

rosary.name: Rosary
rosary.description: May be worth a few coins.

rubber-duck.name: Rubber Duck
rubber-duck.description: Always there to lend an ear, should you need it.

silver-teaspoon-set.name: Silver Teaspoon Set
silver-teaspoon-set.description: A shining, shimmering set  of refinement and elegance.

torn-book.name: Torn Book
torn-book.description: What pages remain speak of chosen heroes, vampires, and lots of longing glances.

very-comfortable-pillow.name: Very Comfortable Pillow
very-comfortable-pillow.description: The envy of every Raider. Like sleeping on an especially ergonomic cloud.

anvil-i.name: Anvil I
anvil-i.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.

anvil-ii.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.

anvil-iv.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.

arpeggio-i.description: Has decent damage output and accuracy.

arpeggio-ii.name: Arpeggio II
